item.description:
Agenda

  • 07:00 - 07:30 Fast networking, exchange business cards
  • 07:30 - 08:00 Internet & local marketing discussion
  • 08:00 - 08:30 Bring your own challenges - discussion, networking
item.how_to_find_us: This is a block away from Taven on the Square. We will be in the lower level. Finding parking on the street is pretty easy around there. It's in the same area of Taven on the Square. There are also two metered parking lots near by.

group.name: The Boston Area Internet Marketing and Advertising Group

item.name: Online and Local Marketing Discussion
